entities.name: magical theory
entities.description: The text mentions 'Magical Theory' as something that is being discarded without a second glance.

entities.name: an appraisal of magical education in europe
entities.description: The book 'An Appraisal of Magical Education in Europe' is mentioned as the next destination after leaving the current location.

entities.name: godric’s hollow
entities.description: Godric's Hollow is a location that Harry wants to visit first, and it holds significance for him due to his parents' graves and his own survival of Voldemort's Killing Curse.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: The Horcruxes are mentioned as a priority that Harry and Hermione should focus on, but they don't know where any of them are located.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who wants to visit Godric's Hollow and understand its significance.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a friend of Harry's who suggests prioritizing the Horcruxes over visiting Godric's Hollow.

relationships.description: Harry wants to visit Godric's Hollow due to its significance and his desire to understand it.
Hermione suggests prioritizing the Horcruxes over visiting Godric's Hollow.
Harry agrees with Hermione that finding the Horcruxes should be a priority, but only if they knew where any of them were located.
